channel.title: Redod
channel.description:
Decided to move the development topic in teams to this becuase i dont need any developers anymore
[size=24pt]Thread is still being updated.[/size]
[center][IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/wi5w8z.png[/img][/center]
[center]I remember back in 2008-2009, There were no shity hybrid pvp leeches. SoulSplit,Project 69, Dds-specz were all servers that dunked my cookie into milk. The Oldschool Graphics, the great economies with limited amount of items. There was no "torva" "korasis" or chaotics. Whips, dds , Godswords , bandos and the occasional set of Dragon claws were the only weapons in your arsenal. Im looking to bring back those days. No Torva, No Korais, No shit. I am looking for a trustworthy development team to help bring back these memories to everyone. [/center]
[center]STAFF TEAM
WEB DEVELOPER sriahciboon
SERVER DEVELOPER NICKYPIE123
GFX NICKYPIE123 DREW[/center]
[center][u]Skype[/u] Nickypie123[/center]
[center][u]Features At The Moment[/u][/center]
[center]Fully Clipped Firemaking
Fully Working 7 quests
Fully Working Rune Essense Mine
items on death
caskets
Runecrafting Base Altars Added
Slayer Base ( will be adding oldschool slayer where npcs give xp, instead of tasks)
Wood Cutting With Stumps
Mining With Disappearing Rocks
KDR COMMAND ADDED
New Yell Command Added ( Req 11 hp to use)
Flawless Switching
Flawless PVP/PVM
ALL SKILL GUIDE INTERFACES
[/center]
[center][u]Media[/u]
[IMG]http://i1122.photobucket.com/albums/l537/Streams2lakes/RP3.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i1122.photobucket.com/albums/l537/Streams2lakes/RP2-1.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i1122.photobucket.com/albums/l537/Streams2lakes/44444444444_0001.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i1122.photobucket.com/albums/l537/Streams2lakes/RP1.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/sd22ky.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/11c59qu.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1122.photobucket.com/albums/l537/Streams2lakes/caskets.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i1122.photobucket.com/albums/l537/Streams2lakes/Type-To-S4444444444end-Cah-1.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i1122.photobucket.com/albums/l537/Streams2lakes/TUtISland.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1122.photobucket.com/albums/l537/Streams2lakes/SMelting.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i1122.photobucket.com/albums/l537/Streams2lakes/Quest-tab.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i1122.photobucket.com/albums/l537/Streams2lakes/Dicing.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i1122.photobucket.com/albums/l537/Streams2lakes/clipped-firemaking.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i1122.photobucket.com/albums/l537/Streams2lakes/Buy-100.png[/img]
[/center]
Please Post Bellow Or Add Me On Skype If you want 2 beta test, it is online now, but no advertisey hre :D
[size=24pt]Thread is still being updated.[/size]

item.title: Redod
item.dc:creator: @nickypie nickypie
item.description:
@nickypie wrote:

Thanks for the Bump. Thanks to one of the moparscape members there is now Server Sided Php highscores without that dumb xxamp.

Full Release is going to be soon. pm me for forums.

item.title: Redod
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“nickypie, post:3, topic:446391”][quote author=Uncalled link=topic=549258.msg4026558#msg4026558 date=1340384828]
oh now what is this? very good looking. much luck to you, sir.
[/quote]
What do you mean? its Pi. Thanks for saying it looks good, I Aprecciate it. im making a new banner tho because aperently thats the motto of google or w.e[/quote]yes i know it’s pi. i said “oh now what is this?” because i came here expecting yet another leech.

Read full topic

item.title: Redod
item.dc:creator: @nickypie nickypie
item.description:
@nickypie wrote:

No, i was called nickypie when i was little, and i made this account in 2007 so…(whole life story)

This is what i came up with for a new banner and slogan
